site_name: Development Site At 20-21 Grosvenor Square, 19-20 Providence Court And
description: Amendments to planning permission dated 25 October 2017 (RN: 16/12213), 'Demolition of existing building and redevelopment behind retained facade on Grosvenor Square and part retained on North Audley Street; extensions at roof level and infill extensions from second to eighth floor level within the recesses on the North Audley Street elevation and at the rear; excavation of three new basement  levels; car parking spaces within basement levels with vehicular access from Providence Court; provision of  a garden and terraces/balconies; creation of lightwells on North Audley Street; all in association with the use of the building for residential purposes (Class C3) comprising a maximum 36 flats'; NAMELY, to increase from 45 to 46 car parking spaces, relocate cycle parking spaces, basement plant room layout updates as a result of detailed design development, increase in basement level residential storage cages, reduction in size of roof lights, internal layout changes as a result of detail design development on levels 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8 though no change to the mix of units or number of bedrooms, and addition of artificial living wall at seventh floor level.
